preview: CHAPTER 13: THE 30-DAY ENERGY RECLAMATION PROTOCOL  Opening Story: "The Experiment That Changed Everything"  "Thirty days," Dr. Marcus Chen said, leaning back in his chair. "That's all I'm asking. Thirty days of consistent practice."  Across from him, Elijah Thompson shifted uncomfortably. At 43, he'd built a successful construction company, raised three children, and was respected in his community. But the constant pressure had taken its toll.
